typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SourceQuery as string,
	ColumnList as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ($SourceQuery),
	format: 'query') ~> Financesource
Financesource sink(input(
		SourseSK as integer,
		BinaryId as string,
		TypeCode as string,
		IdamUserId as string,
		UserType as string,
		UserName as string,
		UserEmail as string,
		UserCreatedTimeStamp as string,
		LastSignedInTimeStamp as string,
		EmployerAccountId as string,
		Ukprn as string,
		RunId as long,
		AsDm_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		AsDm_UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FinanceSink
